message:
Fix critical auth bugs: data loading and user profile

Fixes two critical issues after migration:

1. **Data not loading after migration**:
   - App now loads from database when authenticated
   - Loads current/most recent session on mount
   - Loads pictures from database (not localStorage)
   - Loads user preferences (voice configs, selected state)
   - Auto-saves to database every 3 seconds (authenticated users)
   - Guest mode still uses localStorage

2. **User profile button not working**:
   - Added onClick handler to profile button
   - Shows dropdown menu with user info and logout
   - Displays first letter of name/email as avatar
   - Clean dropdown UI with backdrop

Technical changes:
- App.tsx: Load data from database on mount if authenticated
- App.tsx: Auto-save to database with 3s debounce
- App.tsx: Only save to localStorage in guest mode
- CollectionsView.tsx: Load pictures from database
- LeftSidebar.tsx: Add user menu dropdown with logout

Database is now the source of truth for authenticated users!
